articles.title: Your Next AI Chat Could Include Ads Thanks to Google
articles.author: Jean Leon
articles.summary: Google is introducing AdSense for Search to third-party AI chatbots, enabling the display of targeted ads within user chats. This initiative expands Google's advertising solutions and aims to monetize AI interactions, with initial tests conducted with AI-powered search startups like iAsk and Liner. The feature is currently available to third-party chatbots integrating Google's advertising solution.

articles.title: McDonald's Causes a Stir With New 'Secret' Menu Item
articles.author: Anne Erickson
articles.summary: McDonald's customers are creating a new 'secret menu' item called Cotton Candy Sprite by adding French vanilla syrup to Sprite. This customized drink has gained popularity through social media platforms like TikTok and YouTube, with users describing its taste as similar to cotton candy or vanilla.

articles.title: AI in every room: why home appliances are getting smart
articles.summary: Samsung Australia has launched a new range of AI-powered home appliances, including washing machines and ovens, with features like food cataloging refrigerators and burn-detecting ovens. The launch aims to compete with similar products from LG, Hisense, Ecovacs, Philips, and Electrolux, emphasizing convenience and energy savings for consumers.

articles.title: AI in every room: why home appliances are getting smart
articles.author: Jennifer Dudley-Nicholson
articles.summary: Samsung Australia has launched a new range of AI-powered appliances, including washing machines and ovens, competing with similar products from LG, Hisense, Ecovacs, Philips, and Electrolux. The appliances feature AI for convenience, with refrigerators having embedded cameras and ovens sending alerts when dinner is burning, and energy savings are a key focus, with integration of electricity retailer pricing within the Samsung appliance app.

articles.title: Mark Zuckerberg's Meta dreams, Microsoft's earnings smash, and Reddit's surprise: Tech news roundup
articles.author: Quartz Intelligence Newsroom
articles.summary: Huawei is preparing to test new, powerful AI chips. These chips are intended to rival those made by Nvidia.

articles.title: 35 Springtime Dresses That'll Make You Want To Twirl In A Field Like 'The Sound Of Music'
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Several companies are launching or showcasing new dresses for the spring season. These include Son de Flor with its vintage-style button-down dress, Old Navy featuring a sleeveless fit and flare dress, Abercrombie & Fitch offering a mini dress with playful puffy sleeves, Rebdolls presenting a cotton maxi dress with a twist, Hill House Home promoting its iconic Nap Dress, Birdy Grey highlighting a botanical dress, Quince launching a fit and flare midi dress, and American Eagle showcasing a corset midi dress.  Additionally, Amazon and Etsy are platforms where many of these dresses are available.

articles.title: Chinese singles are looking for love in video chats — with thousands following along in real time
articles.author: ELSIE CHEN
articles.summary: Tinder released a "female-focused package," which is a curated list of "high-quality profiles" to improve the user experience. Match Group introduced a "Share My Date" feature to allow tracking while meeting up with an online stranger, and Tinder conducted a "major ecosystem cleanup" to remove fake profiles and scammers.

articles.title: Dyson cuts £250 off vacuum that's '6x more powerful' than others on the market
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Dyson has reduced the price of its premium Dyson 360 Vis Nav™ robot vacuum cleaner by £250, bringing it down to £999.99. The robot vacuum boasts six times the suction power compared to other robot vacuums on the market and uses intelligent 360° vision to navigate and map rooms.

articles.title: McDonald's customers can get free food this bank holiday - how to get yours
articles.author: Katie Collier
articles.summary: McDonald's is introducing a new Breakfast Savers Menu, featuring items like the Sausage Sandwich and Saver Bacon Roll, priced at £1.99 and £2.19 respectively, in selected restaurants starting May 7. Customers can access these offers and other deals through the McDonald's App, including a rewards program where they earn points for purchases.

articles.title: SALTZMAN: Wait, what? AI will soon shop for you
articles.author: Marc Saltzman
articles.summary: Visa has introduced Visa Intelligent Commerce, a suite of tools to enable AI agents to shop and make purchases on behalf of users. Visa partners with companies like OpenAI and other AI developers to allow AI to make purchases with consumer consent. The start of Visa-led agentic commerce is expected in the next couple of months.

articles.title: 2025 MG ZS comparison: Old v New
articles.author: Andrew Maclean
articles.summary: The MG ZS is presented as an affordable, family-friendly small SUV.

articles.title: 2025 MG ZS comparison: Old v New
articles.author: Andrew Maclean
articles.summary: MG's design team introduced a new ZS model featuring a sharper exterior design. The new model boasts more expression in its face, detailed profile, and a sleeker silhouette compared to its predecessor. Upgrades include visual design improvements.

articles.title: Next's 'gorgeous' £34 dress that's 'perfect for summer'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next introduced the Cream Mono Placement Floral Linen Scoop Back Mini Shift Dress, priced at £34 and available in various patterns and sizes. The dress features a linen-blend fabric, mini length, a scoop back, side pockets, and a split side hem, receiving generally positive reviews for its fit and design.

articles.title: 28 Products To Make Cleaning So Easy You *Almost* Won't Mind Doing It Anymore
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing or promoting new cleaning products and services available on Amazon. These include Bioclean's hard water stain remover, Levoit's compact air purifier, Dawn Powerwash, Bissell Little Green carpet and upholstery cleaner, Chom Chom pet hair remover, Baseboard Buddy, Cerama-Bryte cooktop cleaner, Hoover PowerDash carpet-cleaning machine, and Puracy's all-in-one cleaning concentrate, each designed to solve specific cleaning challenges and improve efficiency.

articles.title: Is ALDI's Summit Diet Cola Really Better Than Diet Coke? I Just Tried It For The First Time
articles.author: Jenna Sims
articles.summary: ALDI's Summit Diet Cola is a cost-effective alternative to Diet Coke, priced at $5 for a 12-pack. While slightly sweeter and less carbonated than Diet Coke, the Summit Diet Cola offers a comparable taste experience, making it a viable option for budget-conscious consumers.

articles.title: ITC Leverages AI for Supply Chain Efficiency, Demand Forecasting
articles.summary: ITC Ltd. is utilizing AI to innovate products and improve supply chain efficiency. The company uses AI tools for demand forecasting, has developed a digital supply chain to support multiple retail formats, and uses pilot plants to rapidly prototype new products, launching over 100 products a year. They also use AI to personalize advertisement.

articles.title: Official Look at the 'Melo' Air Jordan 12 Retro
articles.summary: Air Jordan is a Nike product line. This line is well known in the footwear industry.

articles.title: Walmart announces major change to all delivery orders
articles.author: Jena Warburton
articles.summary: Walmart is leveraging a new geospatial technology to improve its online order fulfillment. This technology divides areas into hexagonal grids packed with real-time data to anticipate demand and plan delivery routes, expanding Walmart's service to reach 12 million new households.

articles.title: Whiterose Group Launches ‘Fresh Water Villas', Names New Brand Ambassadors
articles.author: This Day
articles.summary: Whiterose Properties, a subsidiary of the Whiterose Group, launched 'Fresh Water Villas by Whiterose Plan', a new residential development project. The development features open-concept living spaces with high-quality finishes and is located near major roads, schools, and amenities.

articles.title: Google is speeding up its introduction by opening its new artificial intelligence (AI) search functi..
articles.author: A Prescription
articles.summary: Google is launching its new AI search function "AI Mode" in the U.S., removing the waiting list and making it available to users over 18. The update includes new features like visual information cards, displaying operating hours, reviews, and real-time prices for local businesses and products. Google also added a search continuity feature, allowing users to easily revisit previous search history for long-term projects.

articles.title: The Android Show, Rad Power's New Ebikes, and Yale's ADT Smart Lock'Your Gear News of the Week
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Philips Norelco introduced an AI-powered shaver. Wiz launched Sync Box, an affordable synced lighting alternative for TVs.

articles.title: vivo unveils Y19 5G
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: vivo launched the vivo Y19 5G smartphone, featuring Rainbow Crystal Texture, a 5500 mAh BlueVolt Battery, AI-powered camera capabilities, and IP64 dust and water resistance. The phone is priced from Rs10,499 to Rs12,999 and is available on Flipkart, the vivo India e-store, and partner retail stores.

articles.title: Moto G Stylus 5G (2025) Review: The Best Stylus Phone Under $400 Just Got Better
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola is introducing the Moto G Stylus 5G (2025), a stylus-equipped smartphone featuring an impressive upgrade. This new phone will have 68W TurboPower charging capabilities and will be available as the best stylus phone of 2025.

articles.title: Whiterose Group Launches ‘Fresh Water Villas', Names New Brand Ambassadors
articles.author: Nigeria
articles.summary: Whiterose Properties has launched 'Fresh Water Villas by Whiterose Plan', a new five-bedroom residential development project in Lagos. This project aims to blend comfort and convenience with stylish, open-concept living spaces and high-quality finishes. In addition to the new development, Whiterose Properties introduced new brand ambassadors to support the brand outreach initiatives.

articles.title: I tried Starbucks' brand-new dessert-inspired range
articles.author: Food
articles.summary: Starbucks has launched a new range of tiramisu-inspired drinks, including the Tiramisu Cream Iced Latte, Tiramisu Cream Iced Oat Shaken Espresso, and the Tiramisu Frappuccino Blended Beverage. The new range aims to provide a dessert-like coffee experience, targeting tiramisu lovers.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 leak
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: OnePlus is anticipated to launch the successor to the OnePlus Nord 4. This suggests a new product introduction within the OnePlus Nord line.

articles.title: Google Pixel 9 Series Sale!
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Google is launching the Pixel 9 and Pixel 9 Pro smartphones. The Pixel 9 will start at $599 and offers a premium Android experience, featuring a 6.3-inch display, Google Tensor G4 chip, 12GB of RAM, Magic Eraser, and a dual-camera system.

articles.title: Everyone needs an LBD and this £45 version from M&S gets our vote
articles.author: Maisie Bovingdon
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) is offering the Pure Cotton Round Neck Midi Waisted Dress for £45. The dress is crafted from pure cotton, featuring a fitted bodice, round neckline, and A-line skirt, and is available in various sizes. It is marketed as a versatile summer dress suitable for both casual and formal occasions.

articles.title: Do You Know Why Maggi Tastes Better In The Mountains: Kunal Vijayakar Explores THIS Himalayan Obsession
articles.author: Shireen Jamooji
org: Food Safety and Standards Authority of India
articles.summary: Nestle introduced Maggi to India, where it quickly became a cultural icon. After a ban in 2015 due to high levels of lead and MSG, Maggi made a comeback with revamped manufacturing processes.

articles.title: NVIDIA tweaks AI chips to bypass US rules, reach China
articles.summary: NVIDIA is developing a redesigned chip, with samples potentially available in June. The company is also creating a China-specific version of its latest AI chip, Blackwell, suggesting the introduction of new or updated product offerings.

articles.title: Aldi's £7 plumping cream is 90% cheaper than Tatcha's but claims similar results– we test it
articles.author: Zoe Cripps
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced the Lacura Plumping Face Cream, priced at £6.99, as a budget-friendly alternative to Tatcha's The Dewy Skin Cream, which retails for £67. Aldi claims the new cream offers hydration and radiance, aiming to compete with the established Tatcha product.

articles.title: Simba's new deal gives customers up to £836 of 'free' gifts on any mattress purchase
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Simba is offering a promotion where customers who purchase a Simba mattress can receive up to £800+ worth of complimentary sleep-enhancing items, including pillows, mattress protectors, and a luxury duvet. For example, purchasing a double, king, or super king Simba Hybrid mattress comes with two free memory foam pillows and a mattress protector.

articles.title: These new Google Messages features make Android texting better for everyone
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Google Messages is introducing a new set of features, which improves text messaging on Android.

articles.title: The State News Crossword, May 3, 2025
articles.summary: StateNews.com launched a new version of its website and encourages users to test drive it.

articles.title: 5 Self-Care Must-Haves for May: From Haircare to Activewear
articles.author: Crista Lacqua
articles.summary: Kérastase is launching an anti-frizz solution, favored by celebrities like Emily Ratajkowski and Sydney Sweeney. Tavi Active has released a new collection of bright-hued workout pieces for the summer season.

articles.title: McDonald's Cotton Candy Sprite Hack Goes Viral: Here's Why Everyone's Talking About It
articles.summary: McDonald's customers are creating a "Cotton Candy Sprite" by customizing regular Sprite with vanilla syrup, a trend popularized on TikTok. This customer-driven customization has gained popularity, demonstrating a new way consumers are interacting with and effectively creating a new "product" at McDonald's.

articles.title: Dyson cuts �250 off vacuum that's '6x more powerful' than others on the market
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Dyson claims its vacuum cleaner has six times more suction power than comparable robot vacuums available.

articles.title: Chelsea to have 1,400 luxury apartments built in Dubai with Blues badge branded on rooftop pitch as part of new sponsorship
articles.author: Goal
articles.summary: Chelsea has announced a new sponsorship with Infinite Athlete. As part of the deal, the Infinite Athlete logo will appear on Chelsea's shirts, and Infinite Athlete's AI-powered platform will be integrated to enhance player performance analysis and fan engagement. The partnership is reportedly worth £50 million per year.

articles.title: Unilever's CLEAR Launches Scientific Anti-Dandruff Series: Lab-Proven Tech Targets Oil, Flakes, and Sensitivity
articles.author: Victoria Advocate
articles.summary: CLEAR, a Unilever brand, introduced a premium professional offering on April 17, 2025.
